content.name: Week 1
content.des: Resume tips, old people singing, and the benefits of learning new stuff.
content.alt: Roman numeral I on orange paint-spattered background.

content.caption: 5 Resume Mistakes You Need to Avoid

content.content: As we are in internship season, our first resource for this week will be related to internships. In this video, Thomas Frank, a popular productivity YouTuber gives top 5 resume mistakes people make, some of the tips are really nice ones that we hadn’t come across before so check it out!
(ProfDev has also put together resources related to resumes and cover letters, we’ll leave a link at the bottom of this article because who wants to dig up The Hub, amirite?)

content.caption: Old Men Singing at Tim Horton's

content.content: We hope this video makes you smile just like it made us!
Learn about learning something new! This article explains 11 benefits of learning something new. Have we told you how much we love learning new things?!
We hope you enjoy the videos and have a fantastic week! (Don't forget to check out our cool website ;) )
Deceleroo MiCo and the MHS Team

content.name: Week 2
content.des: A Chinese parable, having fun at work, and the history of Happy Birthday.
content.alt: Roman numeral II on yellow paint-spattered background.

content.content: Many times we forget that we don’t have the full picture and we can’t see beyond the now. What you see as bad today may actually be good tomorrow #broadframing #ohnothatHCisgone. In this video, Prince EA reminds us of this using a Chinese parable.
A must-see version of “Africa” by Toto! I bless the rains down in Africaaaaa *music emoji*
Did you know that before March 2016, movies that sang the Happy Birthday song had to pay a company for singing it? Learn about the interesting history of the happy birthday song!
Have a beautiful week and enjoy the videos! (Don't forget to check out our awesome website ;) )
Deceleroo MiCo and the MHS Team
